name: We Need Salad
description:
In this game we manage a sweet mouse. Our mission is to take the holy salad to the shaman mouse. In this journey, the salad is reached by building bridges and collecting nutrients.

A fun adventure awaits you..

For 2022 GamesPlusJam. #GPJam

Credit:

Game Developer: Yusuf Can Belli

3D Artist : Alperen Can

Screenwriter: Alperen Can

Music : Furkan Uçkun
